item.title: JAM Stack - Hugo - Blackout
item.description: In 2013, I was working as a technical lead for the company website transformation project. The technology was preselected by the vendor and upper management (SharePoint) and the contract was already signed. I was going to assure the quality of delivery. The old website was also SharePoint and it was too expensive to scale and maintain. Of course, I am not going to mention about the cost of licence, development and infrastructure of this new website but this was (probably today in many organizations) the situation more or less 10 years ago.

item.title: Fundamentals
item.description: I restarted this blog to go back, remind and remember the fundamentals that brought me here. Fundamentals are the compass that keeps mind and reality together. Joel Goldberg, 45 years experienced software engineering veteran wrote a great article about basics. I put here to remind and remember. Focus on the Fundamentals Technology constantly changes, but some fundamental approaches to software development transcend these trends. Here are six fundamentals that will continue to be relevant for a long time.
